member.name: T:AccControl.FrmMoreTime
member.summary: This class provides the functionality for the "Add Time to the Timer" dialog box.

member.name: M:AccControl.FrmMoreTime.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: The constructor for the form that allows the user to select more time.

member.name: M:AccControl.FrmMoreTime.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:AccControl.FrmMoreTime.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:AccControl.FrmMoreTime.NewTime
member.summary: The new time value the user selected for the automatic click value.

member.name: T:AccControl.TimerButton
member.summary: This class contains the control functionality for the TimerButton control.

member.name: M:AccControl.TimerButton.#ctor
member.summary: The constructor for the TimerButton control.

member.name: M:AccControl.TimerButton.TimerStart(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns the button timer on so that the button will click automatically when time expires.
member.param: Set to true to turn the timer on or false to turn the timer off.

member.name: M:AccControl.TimerButton.AutoClickReset
member.summary: This method resets the AutoClick value to a user click state.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.TimerInterval
member.summary: Sets the timing interval for the timer in seconds.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.CountdownEnabled
member.summary: Enables the count down display in the button caption.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.TimerValue
member.summary: Returns the amount of time left before the automatic click takes place.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.TimerEnabled
member.summary: Returns true if the timer is running.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.TimerStarted
member.summary: Returns true when the timer is started.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.AutoClick
member.summary: Returns true when the button automatically clicks itself rather than receiving a click from the user.

member.name: P:AccControl.TimerButton.NoMoreTimeMenu
member.summary: This property turns the More Time context menu On and Off. Setting this value to true turns the menu Off, which means the user won't be able to change the timeout value.
